titles.title: Relationship between Linear Equations and Matrix Equations

para.para.body: There is a fundamental connection between systems of linear equations and certain matrix equations. Indeed, given a system of linear equations

para.para.body: Then observe that the left hand side of the given system of linear equations is just the matrix product
Accordingly, the given system of linear equations is equivalent to the matrix equation
